title: When is the next ip chroma sale?

replies.body: So it's been 6 months; are twice yearly chroma ip sales still part of the plan? Any idea on a timeline?

Our [**Chromas 1.1 FAQ**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas#faq) mentions:

> *"You can purchase chromas for IP during special chroma IP sales that take place twice a year. During these promotion periods, you can purchase a chroma for 2000 IP."*

Other than that, I'm not sure when the next Chroma sale will be. Keep an eye on our News Page for any announcements! ( ᐛ )و
